programme.title: Question Time
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce presents Question Time with a panel of politicians and other guests facing topical questions from an audience in different parts of the UK each week. Also live on iPlayer at 20:00.

programme.title: Last Woman on Earth with Sara Pascoe (Denmark) S2 (2/3)
programme.desc: «Denmark»Sara Pascoe learns Denmark's dying jobs, from sailmaking and tattooing to Lego building.

programme.title: This is BBC Two
programme.desc: Highlights of programmes on BBC Two.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Christina Trevanion presents a right royal showdown to celebrate the coronation of King Charles III. Experts Raj Bisram and Roo Irvine are on hand to help two teams of royal enthusiasts as they race to be crowned winners. Christina also visits a pottery for an exclusive look at some new commemorative ware, and she makes her own royal plate fit for a king.

programme.title: Clive Myrie's Italian Road Trip (Capri) S1 (5/15)
programme.desc: «Capri»Clive finds himself on stage in the world's most surprising celebrity nightclub.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S3 (8/15)
programme.desc: Rick learns about the women who worked in the mines and gets merry on botanical spirits.

programme.title: Banjo: Designing the Hebrides (Fish Shop) S1 (1/6)
programme.desc: «Fish Shop»Banjo is brought in to transform a beloved family fish shop on the Isle of Mull.

programme.title: Nicky Campbell BBC News Talk
programme.desc: Nicky Campbell takes your calls on the day's talking points, hearing views and experiences from across the UK. Call 08085 909693 between 9am and 11am on weekdays (calls are free from mobiles and landlines).

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: Impossible S5
programme.desc: Game show in which players must avoid giving impossible answers to a set of questions.

programme.title: Eggheads S20
programme.desc: General knowledge quiz featuring probably the greatest quiz team in Britain.

programme.title: Equestrian: Badminton Horse Trials
programme.desc: Coverage of the final day at the Badminton Horse Trials, one of the highlights on the equestrian calendar. With the dressage and cross country done and dusted, it's time for the show jumping segment, which decides the final placings. In 2022, Olympic gold medallist Laura Collett set the lowest score in the 73-year history of the trials, as she won the event for the first time on her horse London 52.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee S8
programme.desc: Music Week brings three different musical and sartorial genres to the Sewing Bee. Sara Pascoe kicks off the week with a pattern for the parka coat that was adopted by Mod culture in the 1960s. With its classic fishtail vent and complex zip opening and hood, this is a feat of engineering. Country music is the inspiration for the Transformation Challenge, as the sewers take old denim and turn it into stage gear worthy of Dolly Parton. Finally, the Made to Measure is an homage to David Bowie and his many incarnations. The sewers pay tribute with Bowie-inspired outfits fitted to a model.

programme.title: Flog It ! S16
programme.desc: Flog It! is in Scotland today at Culzean Castle in Ayrshire. H,undreds of local people arrive with their family heirlooms for valuations and the experts choose a selection of antiques to go off to auction. Paul Martin finds out about the history of smuggling in this part of Scotland.

programme.title: Richard Osman's House of Games S5
programme.desc: Every day this week, celebrity contestants Sean Fletcher, Louise Minchin, Chris Washington and Kimberly Wyatt take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman. A daily winner is declared following a quickfire round at the end of each show, and the scores are tallied across the week, resulting in an overall champion being crowned on Friday. Will the winning stars opt for the much-coveted House of Games wheelie luggage, or will they be tempted by the House of Games reusable coffee mug, which is brand new for this series?

programme.title: Clive Myrie's Italian Road Trip (Naples) S1 (6/15)
programme.desc: «Naples»Clive discovers why Neapolitan pizza is the best pizza in the world.

programme.title: Planète bleue (Oceans of Wonder) (n°4)
programme.desc: «Oceans of Wonder»This extended special of the nature documentary series journeys from the equator to the unexplored depths, meeting the best-loved characters from the series.

programme.title: University Challenge
programme.desc: It's the last of the quarter-final matches. Jeremy Paxman asks the questions.
During the First World War, two soldiers must cross no-man's land to deliver a message.

programme.title: Une vie en 10 photos (John Lennon) S1 (4/6)
programme.desc: «John Lennon»Ten defining pictures - from iconic shots to private snaps - reveal key moments in the life of John Lennon.
